text: Henri Antoine de Ligne, Hereditary Prince of Ligne (Henri Antoine Gabriël Wauthier Marie Lamoral de Ligne; born 1 March 1989), is a Belgian aristocrat. He is the only son of Michel, 14th Prince of Ligne, and his wife, Princess Eleonora of Orléans-Braganza.Enache, Nicolas. La Descendance de Marie-Therese de Habsburg. ICC, Paris, 1996. pp. 46, 51, 427–429 . (French). He is the heir apparent to the headship of the House of Ligne and, thus, to the title Prince de Ligne. ==Titles and styles== *1989–present: His Highness Prince Henri Antoine de Ligne ==References== *Princes of Ligne Category:1989 births Category:Princes of Ligne Henri Antoine Category:Living people
title: Henri Antoine, Hereditary Prince of Ligne
